1039050.name: Copperbell Demo
1039050.description:
Darkness is creeping into the lands. The rise of the Bad Moon heralds the Dragonbell's toll. Can you fight through the corruption and restore the balance of this world?

Key Features:

  • Original setting realised in beautiful hand-drawn art
  • Each area has its own environment, dangers and secrets to uncover
  • The game is short and sweet, you would probably beat it over the weekend

Core Gameplay:

  • Test your wit and will by fighting enemies and evading traps
  • Explore and master dangerous environments
  • Collect coins to upgrade your abilities
  • Defeat challenging bosses

This demo lets you play through the first area of the game.
